body_content.explanation: embarrassment, or a situation that is difficult and not relaxed:
examples: In spite of the divorce, there was no awkwardness between them - in fact they seemed very much at ease.
The internet removes the awkwardness of a face-to-face interaction.

body_content.explanation: the situation of being difficult to use, do, or deal with:
examples: The awkwardness of the shape makes the desk difficult to lift.
the awkwardness of making complex arrangements to suit so many people

body_content.explanation: a quality of not being natural, relaxed, or attractive:
examples: He outgrew his physical awkwardness and became a leading man in school plays.
The world of high fashion has embraced ugliness or awkwardness as a new kind of beauty.

body_content.explanation: the fact of being deliberately unhelpful:
examples: Is he really unable to help or is it just awkwardness?
